Contributor: United States. Army. Engineer Reproduction Plant.;
Note: "1149" appears on bottom right of poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that mechanics and apprentices are wanted for enlistment in the construction division of the army. Illustration shows a chart of the work of the construction division of the army.
